attributes.action: Give workers more annual leave than bank holidays
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is talk about giving workers an extra bank holiday as the UK has the fewest bank holidays in the EU. I would rather have the extra bank holidays as annual leave. The reason is that I can book off leave when I want it and not being dictated by the govt when my holidays are. Plus, I would able to visit places such banks and libraries which are closed at bank holidays.
